name: Fudge Brownies
author: M.E.
instructions: In mixing bowl combine sugar, margarine, eggs, and vanilla; beat on medium speed until thoroughly combined. Stir in fudge topping, stir in nuts, flour, cocoa and baking powder until combined. Pour into a greased 13 x 9 inch pan. Bake at 350Â° for 50 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean. Cool on wire rack, cut.
